about_the_game:
In Clash at the Crossroads, step into the boots of a lone archer tasked with defending his village against relentless enemy waves. In a vivid 3D medieval world, your precision, strategy, and timing are all that stand between safety and destruction. With intuitive gameplay mechanics, each arrow shot requires careful aim and perfect timing to ensure maximum damage against advancing foes.

FEATURES


  • Engaging 3D Shooter Action: Experience the thrill of defending your village from the vantage point of a watchtower, using only your bow and your wits.
  • Innovative Gameplay Mechanics: Master the unique shooting mechanic, where timing your release at the perfect moment unleashes devastating attacks.
  • Progressive Difficulty: Face increasingly challenging waves of enemies approaching your village through three distinct converging paths

Embrace the role of the Archer, and challenge your skills with each wave. Can you protect the village from destruction?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL, AMD 2 cores CPU at 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 7950 or above, Nvidia GTX 670 or above. 4GB video ram.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
